Text: This tells me NOTHING! If you can't be bothered to provide detailed information or at the very least, A DESCRIPTION,  then I can't be bothered with any of your downloads.

I apologize, these are my first uploads. I'll put a description here:
DVDRIP from widescreen movie, "Robots". The movie came out in 2005. The decription on the back reads: "Fasten your seat bolts and gear up for a hilarious, heartwarming comedy that's fun for the whole family!
With the help of his misfit mechanical friends, a small town robot named Rodney embarks on the adventure of a lifetime as he heads for the big city to pursue his dreams---and ultimately proves that anyone can shine no matter what they're made of."

And thank you again, suiteo, for the feedback.
